headline: Emerging Technologies Transforming Manufacturing | Key Players, Market Trends, and Regional Insights in Manufacturing Technology Growth
summary: The global emerging technologies in manufacturing market is projected to grow from $179.50 million in 2023 to $1.14 billion by 2034, at a CAGR of 18.53%.
